SettingsMenu - Class in Unnamed Package
Settings menu class which is the settings menu for the game which changes ths settings for the game like the fullscreen ,the color, the music, turning music on/ff.
stopPlayback() - Static method in class MusicPlayer
Stops the playback of the music by first checking that the MusicPlayer.clip is not equal to null and uses the DataLine.stop() method to stop the music and closes the clip completely by using Line.close()
